main event: An observer from MATS 4 flight reported a bright greenish white flare bursting into two orange flares over the Pacific Ocean.
interesting points: The sighting took place on 17 May 1963.,The coordinates of the sighting are 46-13N 173-53W in the Pacific Ocean.,The observer described the event as a flare bursting with a 10 second downward progression.,Various possible explanations for the object were listed including balloon, meteor, aircraft, and UFO.,The document comes from the Project Blue Book investigation into unidentified flying objects.
sighted object: a bright greenish white flare bursting into two orange flares
